com.utilis.game.gui
Class Canvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.utilis.game.gui.Canvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Canvas
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A class for painting and managing the contents of a Window. It is uses double buffering.

Author:
Cin316
See Also:
Window, Screen, Serialized Form
